name: Konstrukt™ Trafficshield™
subtitle: K-406 Rapid Cure Self Leveling Underlayment Compound

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: Konstrukt™ Trafficshield™ K-406 Rapid Cure Self Leveling Underlayment Compound is a product used to level minor substrate unevenness before the placement of various coverings such as ceramic tiles, natural stones and marbles, wood, and carpets.
